doc.title: Durian Degustation XI: Registration is now opened!
doc.text: Notice/DT is/VBZ hereby/RB given/VBN that/IN registration/NN for/IN Durian/NNP Degustation/NNP XI/NNP is/VBZ now/RB opened/VBD !/. Depending/JJ on/IN supply/NN on/IN that/DT day/NN ,/, we/PRP should/MD be/VB tasting/VBG Mao/NN Shan/NN Wang/NN ,/, D24/NN ,/, Hong/NNP Xia/NNP ,/, Golden/NNP Phoenix/NNP ,/, XO/NNP ,/, Green/NNP Bamboo/NNP and/CC hopefully/NNP Black/NNP Pearl/NNP !/.
